meanings.definition: The study or practice of versification or metrics.
meanings.sent1: In her logaoedics class, she learned how to analyze the structure of poems.
meanings.sent2: His logaoedics expertise helped him appreciate the rhythm of the sonnet.
meanings.sent3: The logaoedics professor made learning about poetry fun and engaging.
meanings.sent4: Her logaoedics skills allowed her to see the beauty in the structure of the haiku.
meanings.sent5: Studying logaoedics made him see the patterns in the ballad clearly.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the art of composing verse.
meanings.sent1: The logaoedics workshop focused on techniques for writing poetry.
meanings.sent2: Her logaoedics style was admired for its lyrical quality.
meanings.sent3: His logaoedics approach to writing made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The logaoedics nature of her words painted vivid pictures in the reader's mind.
meanings.sent5: The logaoedics elements in his writing made the poem flow beautifully.
